title: ITI - Front End Web Development Using React
description: Completed an intensive course focused on building modern, responsive web applications using React.js. Gained hands-on experience with React components, state management, hooks, and integrating APIs. Developed projects showcasing proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React best practices.
Relevant Coursework: Web Development, Data Structures, Algorithms, Database Systems, Software Engineering
